channel.title: 525 prayer

item.title: 525 prayer
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

How would i go about adding prayer to a command? This is kind of confusingâ€¦ It works for everything but prayer;

[code]package com.rs2hd.packethandler.commands;

import com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import com.rs2hd.GameEngine;

/*
*
*/
public class Master implements Command {

private GameEngine engine;

@Override

public void execute(Player player, String command) {
	try {
		if(!player.SafeZone() && player.getRights() < 2) {
			player.sm("You must be in a Safe Zone to use this command.");
			return;
		}
		player.getSkills().addXp(0, 99999999);
		player.getSkills().addXp(1, 99999999);
		player.getSkills().addXp(2, 99999999);
		player.getSkills().addXp(3, 99999999);
		player.getSkills().addXp(4, 99999999);		
		player.getSkills().addXp(6, 99999999);
                    player.getSkills().addXp(5, 99999999);

	} catch (Exception e) {
		player.sm("Save could not complete, weird issue. Please report to Lewis.");
	}
}
@Override
public int getRights() {
	return 0;
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
